title: Acrylic Felt Fabric Heather Silver / 72" Wide/Sold by The Yard

description: Acrylic Felt is a Excellent quality and pliable, this felt is similar in every way to traditional wool. It's perfect for all fashion and home decorating craft projects. Easy to sew or glue with no raveling edges. The fabric is the same color on either sides.Perfect for Crafts, dolls, stuff toys, plush, manufacturing, displays, clothing, theatrical, costumes, wall-hangings, banners, or any other fun project.
